name: Radar Fantastic Beasts Go
description:
Radar Fantastic Beasts Go
Do you like to play different games are very active? I like the style of Anime and Fantasy? Try our app to find fantastic animals! Walk through the city or an apartment with the phone and look fantastic animals!
Find her own room or outside his monster for fun!
Turn on the camera and start to search for your favorite now! The more animals you find, the more you will have a home zoo!
There are different monsters, elements of water, fire or air! Animals belong to different species, there are dragons, snakes, cats, and absolutely fantastic views!
Catch monsters can only the most nimble and attentive players!
Collect the largest collection of animals pocket and surprise friends and family!
Find all the unusual animals before your friends!
Note that only the radar simulator! It is designed for fun and frolic!
Thank you for choosing our game! Leave us feedback and evaluation and we will make it even better and more interesting!
